package.name: portuguese-accents
package.author: Pedro Tashima
package.description: A package to type Portuguese with a non-Portuguese keyboard layout.
package.title: Portuguese Accents

manifest.author: Pedro Tashima
manifest.description: A package to type Portuguese with a non-Portuguese keyboard layout.
manifest.name: portuguese-accents
manifest.title: Portuguese Accents

packageRepo.readme:
# Portuguese accents package for [espanso](https://espanso.org)
A simple package to type Portuguese with a non-Portuguese keyboard layout.

| Keyword | Replaced |
|---------|----------|
| a[      | á        |
| A[      | Á        |
| a{      | à        |
| A{      | À        |
| a'      | â        |
| A'      | Â        |
| a"      | ã        |
| A"      | Ã        |
| e[      | é        |
| E[      | É        |
| e{      | è        |
| E{      | È        |
| e'      | ê        |
| e'      | Ê        |
| i[      | í        |
| I[      | Í        |
| i{      | ì        |
| I{      | Ì        |
| i'      | î        |
| I'      | Î        |
| o[      | ó        |
| O[      | Ó        |
| o{      | ò        |
| O{      | Ò        |
| o'      | ô        |
| O'      | Ô        |
| o"      | õ        |
| O"      | Õ        |
| u[      | ú        |
| U[      | Ú        |
| u{      | ù        |
| U{      | Ù        |
| u'      | û        |
| U'      | Û        |
| c'      | ç        |
| C'      | Ç        |

For more information, read the [documentation](https://espanso.org/docs/)

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# Portuguese Accents

matches:
  - trigger: "a["
    replace: "á"
  - trigger: "A["
    replace: "Á"
  - trigger: "a{"
    replace: "à"
  - trigger: "A{"
    replace: "À"
  - trigger: "a\""
    replace: "â"
  - trigger: "A\""
    replace: "Â"
  - trigger: "a'"
    replace: "ã"
  - trigger: "A'"
    replace: "Ã"

  - trigger: "e["
    replace: "é"
  - trigger: "E["
    replace: "É"
  - trigger: "e{"
    replace: "è"
  - trigger: "E{"
    replace: "È"
  - trigger: "e\""
    replace: "ê"
  - trigger: "E\""
    replace: "Ê"

  - trigger: "i["
    replace: "í"
  - trigger: "I["
    replace: "Í"
  - trigger: "i{"
    replace: "ì"
  - trigger: "I{"
    replace: "Ì"
  - trigger: "i\""
    replace: "î"
  - trigger: "I\""
    replace: "Î"

  - trigger: "o["
    replace: "ó"
  - trigger: "O["
    replace: "Ó"
  - trigger: "o{"
    replace: "ò"
  - trigger: "O{"
    replace: "Ò"
  - trigger: "o\""
    replace: "ô"
  - trigger: "O\""
    replace: "Ô"
  - trigger: "o'"
    replace: "õ"
  - trigger: "O'"
    replace: "Õ"

  - trigger: "u["
    replace: "ú"
  - trigger: "U["
    replace: "Ú"
  - trigger: "u{"
    replace: "ù"
  - trigger: "U{"
    replace: "Ù"
  - trigger: "u\""
    replace: "û"
  - trigger: "U\""
    replace: "Û"

  - trigger: "c'"
    replace: "ç"
  - trigger: "C'"
    replace: "Ç"
